com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.client

Class ClientSettingsStoreImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.client.ClientSettingsStoreImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerSideSettingsProvider, ClientSettingsStore

    public class ClientSettingsStoreImpl
extends Object
implements ClientSettingsStore
    The class ClientSettingsStoreImpl is the default implementation of ClientSettingsStore. It stores ClientSettings to different sub stores.
